alfredsnippet.snippet:
(cont'd)

"... Direct evidence of galactic magnetic fields are now available. Radio jets, interstellar shocks and many astrophysical phenomena now appear to involve important plasma effects. Although normally less dynamically important than the gravitational force, especially at cosmic scale, plasma astrophysics will likely be at the cutting edge of 21st century astrophysics and cosmology studies."

- Timothy E. Eastman, Plasmas International (USA)
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Timothy Eastman on Plasmas - Part 2
